properties.name: Karakoram Highway
properties.description: Eighth Wonder of the World road crossing the Khunjerab Pass at 4,693m

properties.name: Hunza Valley
properties.description: Legendary Shangri-La with snow-capped peaks and the world's highest international border

properties.name: K2 Base Camp
properties.description: Trek to the base of the world's second-highest and most dangerous peak

properties.name: Baltit Fort
properties.description: 1000-year-old fortress overlooking Hunza Valley, restored by the Aga Khan Foundation

properties.name: Attabad Lake
properties.description: Turquoise lake formed by 2010 landslide, now a stunning boat journey destination
